Component: Iconography

[Media Queries]: layout.html#Media Queries

Introduction

Collection of all icon-based tesla assets we have.

All icons will get the following markup:

▲ 
[class*="icon-tesla--"] {
    font-family: 'tesla';
    &:after {
        font-family: 'tesla';
    }
}

Arrow Icon - Left

▲ 
<div class="icon-tesla--arrow-left"></div>

Arrow Icon - Right

▲ 
<div class="icon-tesla--arrow-right"></div>

Calendar Icon

▲ 
<div class="icon-tesla--calendar"></div>

Camera icon

▲ 
<div class="icon-tesla--camera"></div>

Circle Email Icon

▲ 
<div class="icon-tesla--email"></div>

Dot icon

▲ 
<div class="icon-tesla--dot"></div>

Facebook

▲ 
<div class="icon-tesla--facebook"></div>

Google+ Icon

▲ 
<div class="icon-tesla--gplus"></div>

Printer Icon

▲ 
<div class="icon-tesla--printer"></div>

Question Mark Icon

▲ 
<div class="icon-tesla--question"></div>

Tesla E

▲ 
<div class="icon-tesla--e"></div>

Twitter Icon

▲ 
<div class="icon-tesla--twitter"></div>

WeChat

▲ 
<div class="icon-tesla--wechat"></div>

Weibo

▲ 
<div class="icon-tesla--weibo"></div>
